plays.text: Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Tripping Paul Kariya
Penalty to German Titov 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Stephane Yelle
Penalty to Shjon Podein 2 minutes for Slashing Marty McInnis
Goal scored by Chris Drury assisted by Pascal Trepanier and Steve Reinprecht
Penalty to Jason York 2 minutes for Boarding Steve Reinprecht
Penalty to Oleg Tverdovsky 2 minutes for Hooking Stephane Yelle
Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for Hooking Paul Kariya
Penalty to Paul Kariya 2 minutes for Diving(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Pascal Trepanier and Joe Sakic
Penalty to Chris Drury 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Samuel Pahlsson
Penalty to Vitaly Vishnevski 2 minutes for Elbowing Eric Messier
Goal scored by Matt Cullen assisted by Mike Leclerc and Paul Kariya
